def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = 1
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor - f_i) + abs(d_i - f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = -1
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor - f_i) + abs(d_i - f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor - f_i) + abs(d_i - f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:

    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:

def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = 0
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel -= abs(current_floor - f_i) + abs(d_i - f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = 0
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor - f_i) - abs(d_i - f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = 0
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor - f_i) * abs(d_i - f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = 0
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor + f_i) + abs(d_i - f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = 0
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor * f_i) + abs(d_i - f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = 0
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor - f_i) + abs(d_i + f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel

def calculate_total_lift_travel(N, Q, requests):
    current_floor = 0
    total_travel = 0
    for (f_i, d_i) in requests:
        total_travel += abs(current_floor - f_i) + abs(d_i * f_i)
        current_floor = d_i
    return total_travel
